entries.meaning: The art of applying mock injuries for the purpose of training medical or military personnel.

verbs.description: moulage (third-person singular simple present moulages, present participle moulaging, simple past and past participle moulaged)

entries.meaning: To apply mock injuries for the purpose of training medical or military personnel.
examples: She really wants to get the point across that impalement is serious. I think she's going to moulage a few actors and have them stumble in to really scare the class.
